column4: Quick questionn about a permanent install, I'm in the Windows environment, I have the Ubuntu 6.06 CD, but how do I perm. install the OS on my system using the CD, I see no link or icon to do so?
I tried that once before and the computer froze for some reason
you need to reboot with the cd - that's not a programm that's another OS which will (if you tell it to do so) overvriwite your windows...
